tasks.label: Odoo Doc: Clone & Setup
tasks.command: rm -rf odoo-doc-${input:odooBranch} && git clone --depth 1 --branch ${input:odooBranch} https://github.com/odoo/documentation.git odoo-doc-${input:odooBranch} && cd odoo-doc-${input:odooBranch} && pip install -r requirements.txt && make gettext

inputs.description: Enter the Odoo documentation branch name (e.g., 16.0)
